news.title: Registration Now Open: Gentoo Miniconf 2012 in Prague, CZ

body.p: Today, the most ambitious Free Software event of the Czech Republic officially opens registration! We’ve got an awesome event for you in store with sessions on all major subjects in Free Software and around it. Entry will be free of charge for everyone and we’ll give you 4 events AND a bonus track for that money! One of the events will be our very own Gentoo Miniconf 2012.
We hope to see you all in Prague on October 20-23 2012!

p.e: provided the draft for this announcement.
